Articles.Content:
I have been playing off and on since EA and have recently come back.  I have done flybys of the Mun and Minmus in 1.1 with pretty basic rockets.  Now I am looking to get in some low altitude flybys as I save up enough science to build a lander module.  So I built a 4 stage rocket with boosters and almost immediately after launch begin to tip over.  The thing is perfectly symmetrical  and properly staged, though thinking about it the problem starts way before I need to hit space bar again.  

What am I missing

12 minutes ago, Darkfine said:

What am I missing

A screenshot of your rocket.
Okay so it just stopped doing it.  I have no idea.  Thanks for your interest!
